definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)

sentences.english: After examination and approval by the Trademark Office, a corresponding certificate shall be issued to the registrant and the change shall be published.
sentences.chinese: 经商标局核准后，发给注册人相应证明，并予以公告。

sentences.english: Temporary foreigners' residence permits shall be issued to those residing in China for less than a year.
sentences.chinese: 外国人临时居留证，发给在中国居留不满一年的人员。
请把这个通知用电子邮件发给各位经理。

sentences.english: Jubilantly they field into the classroom. The professor passedoutthe papers.
sentences.chinese: 他们欢快地进了考场，教授把考卷发给他们。

sentences.english: An urgent message was radioed to us this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上有条紧急消息以无线电报发给我们。

sentences.english: And she sent me a link to a website that might help.
sentences.chinese: 接着她发给我一个可能有所帮助的网站链接方式。

sentences.english: American officials initially refused her a work visa.
sentences.chinese: 美国官员起初拒绝发给她工作签证。

sentences.english: The government alloted them 1800 yuan for relief, they again declined the offer.
sentences.chinese: 政府发给他们1800块钱的救济金，他们又没要。

sentences.english: In contrast, out-of-state processors were required to submit title certificates or police certificates.
sentences.chinese: 可是州外的收集者却要提交特许证或警察发给的证书。

sentences.english: He disbursed the flowers to the pupils.
sentences.chinese: 他把鲜花分发给小学生们。

sentences.english: You customize the news and content that comes to you.
sentences.chinese: 可以自定义发给您的新闻和内容。

sentences.english: Parcel out a shipment to several buyers .
sentences.chinese: 把一批船货分发给几家买主。

sentences.english: We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the card.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能改变发给我们的牌，但可以决定如何出牌。

sentences.english: This is being done and the RFP should be circulated in the current month.
sentences.chinese: 这是正在做的和利福平应分发给在目前的一个月。

sentences.english: Send this phrase to the people you will never forget .
sentences.chinese: 把这个句子发给你终身不忘的人。

definition: to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)
to hand over to/to give to higher authority/to seek connections in high places
approved for distribution/to provide (wages etc) as usual (e.g. while an employee is on maternity leave)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
to send to multiple recipients/mass mailout/to occur in a clustered fashion
to pass on to sb/to carry and give to sb else
screenshot/to capture an image displayed on a computer screen
